title: Amazon app for Android removes the ability to purchase digital content to avoid Google fees
content:
Google’s crackdown on in-app billing on Android has resulted in changes to quite a few apps. Now, the main Amazon Shopping app for Android has removed the ability to purchase digital content on Android.

more…

The post Amazon app for Android removes the ability to purchase digital content to avoid Google fees appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google’s crackdown on in-app billing on Android has resulted in changes to quite a few apps. Now, the main Amazon Shopping app for Android has removed the ability to purchase digital content on Android. As reported by BBC, the Amazon Shopping app for Android has removed the ability to purchase digital content with the app. […]
